**Tender Description**
----------------------

Request for Standing Offer for the provision of skilled licensed labour, tools, equipment, supervision, and material as requested by Environment and Climate Change Canada for Building System Maintenance services at The National Hydrology Research Centre and Prairie & North Wildlife Research Centre in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan.
